copy_output_tree_struct(path_in, path_out)[source]¶
mask_data(path_data, fraction_pass, path_output=None, prefix_subset=None, verbose=False, logging=False)[source]¶

fraction_pass = nb between 0 and 1 This function builds the output directory based on the name of the input dir and the prefix.
